lyric_text: School bell rings, walk me home

Sleeping in tents

Sun sinks down, no curfew

To touch my hand

It's nice to have a friend

Rice on the ground looks like snow

Have my back, yeah, every day
Feels like home, stay in bed
The whole weekend
It's nice to have a friend
